titles.title: Providing for the consideration of legislation to reopen the Government.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Van Hollen. Petition No: 113-5.

bill.summary: 10/4/2013--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 1164, the Government Shutdown Prevention Act (making automatic continuing appropriations in the event that a regular appropriation bill for a fiscal year is not enacted before the beginning of such fiscal year or a joint resolution making continuing appropriations is not in effect).
